<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0+"
    pfs=""
>
[Alchemist's Lab](/Equipment.aspx?ID=543)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 287 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** 6
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You need an alchemist's lab to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) [alchemical items](/equipment/alchemical-items) during downtime.

</column>

<title

right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Alchemist's Lab (Expanded)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 287 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 55 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** 6

</row>

</column>

---

An expanded alchemist's lab gives a +1 item bonus to [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) checks to create alchemical items.
